effects: Increase DEF by 60% for 99999 turns to caster
30% chance to counter physical attacks (1x, ATK) to caster for 99999 turns
name: Lvl Up - Monk

desc_short.1: 提高自身防禦的數值+暫時性受到物理攻擊時一定機率進行反擊
desc_short.0: Boost own DEF and temporarily increase chance of countering physical attacks
desc_short.5: Aumenta la DEF propia y aumenta la probabilidad de devolver ataques físicos durante un tiempo
